Fortify agent data frame with columns when individual stops being susceptible and stops being infected (as well as initial state).

fortify_agents.Rd

Fortify agent data frame with columns when individual stops being susceptible and stops being infected (as well as initial state).

fortify_agents(
  data,
  time_col = c("tI", "tR"),
  max_time = floor(max(raw_df[, time_col], na.rm = TRUE)) + 1
)

Arguments

data

data frame, agent based data frame, class ("individuals_df")
time_col

length 2 string vector, column names recording when individual is infected and when they enter the recovery stage
max_time

int, maximum time for infection process

Value

fortified_df data frame, the raw_df plus three additional columns:

init_state

Initial state for individual (at time t = 0). For the states, 0 = S, 1 = I, 2 = R.

max_time_S

maximum time individual was susceptible (S)

max_time_I

maximum time individual was infected (I)

Examples

fortify_df <- fortify_agents(timeternR::hagelloch_raw,
                             time_col = c("tI","tR"),
                             max_time = 95)
assertthat::are_equal(fortify_df[,c("init_state",
"max_time_S", "max_time_I")],
                      timeternR::hagelloch_agents)
#> [1] TRUE
